dict.string: Monimus LLC
Sept '14 - Present
Lead iOS Developer & Mobile Project Manager
● International Team Lead for Native iOS component of the ShowdMe P2P educational platform
○ Overseeing design and implementation of product development
○ Optimized UX/UI across multiple screen sizes and varying network connections
○ Increased security through application of best mobile practices
● Project Lead for native iOS and Android components of the Canvs+ visual project management tool
○ Adapting web designs to provide optimal native mobile experience across all devices
○ Creating state of the art real-time collaborative experience through IoT technologies including but not limited to: NFC, Multipeer Connectivity, Bluetooth LE, and iBeacon
○ Rapid prototyping of multiplatform MVP from concept phase
● Team Lead responsibilities including:
○ Managing Scrum and Kanban boards, weekly sprints, and holding daily stand up meetings
○ Contributing to product design via frequent collaboration with UX/UI design teams
○ Reviewing all code changes to mobile app repositories across several projects
○ Mentoring junior developers in iOS development using both Swift and Objective-C
Kids of Courage
July '09 - Present
Technology Coordinator / Volunteer
● Project Lead for Couragers: a native, multi-platform real-time mobile scheduling application
○ Led design and development of native iOS and Android applications
○ Created and deployed backend web service and database
● Volunteer team leader for care of chronically sick children and young adults in a medically supervised travel program
○ Cared for the longest surviving ventilator-dependent quadriplegic living in the US.
Integrative Pediatric Associates of NY
Sept '13 - Feb '14
Freelance Mobile Consultant
● Building a medical provider mobile application to enhance provider/patient communication management
○ Performed business analysis/design (UML) to document business requirements
○ Designed app architecture leveraging Cocoa Touch networking frameworks and Firebase (Mobile BaaS)
○ Developed technology platform infrastructure architecture deploying to Google App Engine (PaaS)
○ Improved code quality (memory management, performance, security) through implementing static code analysis as part of CI lifecycle
Transperfect Translations

Freelance Mobile Developer
○ Modernized several outdated native iOS translation apps to support iOS 7/8 compatibility
○ Improved application performance and user experience (UX)
○ Managed product backlog, timeline, cost, and development
NY State Senate Campaign

Web Developer / Campaign Strategist
● Developed highly interactive Web 2.0 website supporting campaign needs such as:
○ Voter registration
○ Campaign Contributions
○ Campaign information management
● Contributed to campaign victory through:
○ Organized and led voter outreach and awareness community meetings
○ Managed social media outlets
TMD Tutoring
